actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, in order to extend until June 30, 1979, the authorization for appropriations to assist the States to construct nursing home facilities for veterans.

summary.text: Provides for appropriations to extend until June 30, 1979, assistance to the States to construct nursing home facilities for veterans. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 5033(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, in order to extend until June 30, 1979, the authorization for appropriations to assist the States to construct nursing home facilities for veterans.
